text: Gilles Müller was the defending champion, but he did not participate. Alexander Sarkissian won the title over Connor Smith. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Gimcheon Open ATP Challenger - Singles 2015 Singles
